# estimatedPickupDate

**Instance Property**

The estimated pickup time for the ride.

## Declaration

```swift
var estimatedPickupDate: Date? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Specify the estimated date and time that your driver will pick up the user’s party. Siri and Maps display this information to the user.

The default value of this property is `nil`.

## Accessing the Pickup and Drop Off Times

- **scheduledPickupTime**: The scheduled pickup time for the user.
- **estimatedPickupEndDate**: The date after which the driver may stop waiting for the user.
- **estimatedDropOffDate**: The estimated drop-off time for the ride.
